metadata.name: Golden Token: City 10 1/999
metadata.description:
**[CryptoCitizens](https://opensea.io/collection/cryptocitizensofficial) | [Roadmap](https://www.brightmoments.io/) | [Discord](https://discord.gg/brightmoments)**

A Golden Token City 10 (GTC10) NFT provides the holder with a claim to mint 1 of 1,000 City 10 CryptoCitizen NFTs through an IRL-only mint experience. City 10 will be in Southern Europe (i.e Tel Aviv, Cairo, or Athens) in Winter 2023 and voted on by CryptoCitizen holders in Summer 2023.
